Bullet 1 - Bullet 2 - Bullet 3 ::: ::: ## Callouts ## Note Callouts ::: callout-note ## Note default content ::: ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} ## Note simple content ::: ::: {.callout-note appearance="minimal"} ## Note minimal content ::: ## Warning Callouts ::: callout-warning ## Warning default content ::: ::: {.callout-warning appearance="simple"} ## Warning simple content ::: ::: {.callout-warning appearance="minimal"} ## Warning minimal content ::: ## Tip Callouts ::: callout-tip ## Tip default content ::: ::: {.callout-tip appearance="simple"} ## Tip simple content ::: ::: {.callout-tip appearance="minimal"} ## Tip minimal content ::: ## Important Callouts ::: callout-important ## Important default content ::: ::: {.callout-important appearance="simple"} ## Important simple content ::: ::: {.callout-important appearance="minimal"} ## Important minimal content ::: ## Caution Callouts ::: callout-caution ## Caution default content ::: ::: {.callout-caution appearance="simple"} ## Caution simple content ::: ::: {.callout-caution appearance="minimal"} ## Caution minimal content ::: ## Icons by FontAwesome These are cool {{< fa user >}} but they do need a full render e.g. `$ quarto render` in order to be seen. They can also be used in pdfs | input | output | |:----------------------------------|:-------------------------------------:| | `{{{< fa binoculars >}}}` | {{< fa binoculars >}} Prepare | | `{{{< fa chalkboard-teacher >}}}` | {{< fa chalkboard-teacher >}} Lecture | | `{{{< fa users >}}}` | {{< fa users >}} Lab | | `{{{< fa bookmark >}}}` | {{< fa bookmark >}} Reading | | `{{{< fa book >}}}` | {{< fa book >}} Mini-Dissertation | : Fontawesome {.striped .sm} ## References

include-after-body:
<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    // dispatch for htmlwidgets
    function fireSlideEnter() {
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {
      fireSlideEnter();

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
